metadata.description:
On social media, we consider art to be content, so this isn't a work of art, but rather a piece of content.

About the artist : Farbodâ€™s approach results in the representation of the mystics of Persian culture - a reflection of his roots and identity. He goes beyond the traditional and breaks down the essence and building blocks that make up his rich heritage through the lens of contemporary art.
